function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Preventing outdoor activities for children during home confinement leading to physical and psychological disorders","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in densely populated regions with significant social interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased activities in public and open spaces during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Depiction of climate change as a perpetual pandemic may trivialize the severity of actual pandemics and their impact on public health and safety","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize climate policy in the wake of the pandemic
